items.prompt: She told me that she _____ (go) to the market.?
items.answer: had gone

items.prompt: I understood that he _____ (be) sick for several days.?
items.answer: had been

items.prompt: The teacher explained that there _____ (be) a test next week.?
items.answer: would be

items.prompt: I didn't know that you already _____ (write) your homework.?
items.answer: had written

items.prompt: He informed me that he _____ (travel) to Paris next month.?
items.answer: would travel

items.prompt: I realized that she _____ (study) all night for the exam.?
items.answer: had been studying

items.prompt: I thought they _____ (come) to the party last night.?
items.answer: had come

items.prompt: She told me that she _____ (love) reading historical novels.?
items.answer: loved

items.prompt: I didn't know that you _____ (move) to a new apartment.?
items.answer: had moved

items.prompt: He explained to me that he _____ (work) on a new project.?
items.answer: was working

items.prompt: I understood that she _____ (be) abroad last year.?
items.answer: had been

items.prompt: I thought they _____ (get married) this summer.?
items.answer: would get married

items.prompt: He told me that he _____ (start) a new job.?
items.answer: had started

items.prompt: I didn't know that you _____ (can) play the piano.?
items.answer: could

items.prompt: She informed me that she _____ (move) to another city.?
items.answer: was moving

items.prompt: I know he is a good person.?
items.answer: I knew he was a good person.

items.prompt: I think it will rain tomorrow.?
items.answer: I thought it would rain the next day.

items.prompt: I believe she will succeed.?
items.answer: I believed she would succeed.

items.prompt: I understand you have a lot of work.?
items.answer: I understood you had a lot of work.

items.prompt: I hear they have moved to a new house.?
items.answer: I heard they had moved to a new house.

items.prompt: I see the children are playing in the park.?
items.answer: I saw the children playing in the park.

items.prompt: I assume you will come to the party.?
items.answer: I assumed you would come to the party.

items.prompt: I consider he is right about the situation.?
items.answer: I considered he was right about the situation.

items.prompt: I feel something is wrong.?
items.answer: I felt something was wrong.

items.prompt: I hope you will help me with the project.?
items.answer: I hoped you would help me with the project.

items.prompt: I notice she is upset.?
items.answer: I noticed she was upset.

items.prompt: I wonder if he will finish on time.?
items.answer: I wondered if he would finish on time.

items.prompt: I doubt we will manage to arrive on time.?
items.answer: I doubted we would manage to arrive on time.

items.prompt: I suspect he is hiding something from me.?
items.answer: I suspected he was hiding something from me.

items.prompt: I have a feeling something good will happen.?
items.answer: I had a feeling something good would happen.

items.prompt: He / say / I / be / sick?
items.answer: He said I was sick.

items.prompt: We / think / they / come / to party?
items.answer: We thought they would come to the party.

items.prompt: She / explain / cannot / come / tomorrow?
items.answer: She explained that she couldn't come the next day.

items.prompt: I / know / you / graduate / university?
items.answer: I knew you had graduated from university.

items.prompt: They / believe / we / win / competition?
items.answer: They believed we would win the competition.

items.prompt: We / understand / you / be / very busy?
items.answer: We understood that you were very busy.

items.prompt: I / hear / he / quit / job?
items.answer: I heard that he had quit his job.

items.prompt: She / assume / we / travel / next week?
items.answer: She assumed we would travel the following week.

items.prompt: They / notice / weather / change?
items.answer: They noticed the weather was changing.

items.prompt: We / hope / you / help / us?
items.answer: We hoped you would help us.

items.prompt: I / suspect / she / hide / something / from me?
items.answer: I suspected she was hiding something from me.

items.prompt: He / wonder / whether / manage / finish / project?
items.answer: He wondered whether we would manage to finish the project.

items.prompt: We / doubt / they / tell / truth?
items.answer: We doubted that they were telling the truth.

items.prompt: She / feel / something / not be / right?
items.answer: She felt something was not right.

items.prompt: I / have a feeling / happen / something / interesting?
items.answer: I had a feeling something interesting would happen.

items.prompt: He / believe / we / achieve / great things?
items.answer: He believed we would achieve great things.

items.prompt: She / realize / opportunity / be / important?
items.answer: She realized the opportunity was important.

items.prompt: They / expect / project / take / longer / than / planned?
items.answer: They expected the project would take longer than planned.

items.prompt: We / worry / climate change / affect / future generations?
items.answer: We worried climate change would affect future generations.

items.prompt: I / imagine / technology / revolutionize / industry?
items.answer: I imagined technology would revolutionize the industry.

items.prompt: She / predict / company / expand / globally?
items.answer: She predicted the company would expand globally.

items.prompt: They / assume / economy / improve / next year?
items.answer: They assumed the economy would improve the next year.

items.prompt: We / fear / pollution / cause / irreversible damage?
items.answer: We feared pollution would cause irreversible damage.

items.prompt: He / guess / team / win / championship?
items.answer: He guessed the team would win the championship.

items.prompt: I / suppose / government / implement / new policies?
items.answer: I supposed the government would implement new policies.

items.prompt: She / anticipate / changes / bring / positive results?
items.answer: She anticipated the changes would bring positive results.

items.prompt: We / presume / research / lead / breakthrough?
items.answer: We presumed the research would lead to a breakthrough.

items.prompt: They / calculate / investment / yield / significant returns?
items.answer: They calculated the investment would yield significant returns.

items.prompt: I / theorize / experiment / prove / hypothesis?
items.answer: I theorized the experiment would prove the hypothesis.

items.prompt: He told me he will come, but he didn't come.?
items.answer: He told me he would come, but he didn't come.

items.prompt: I knew she will succeed in her exam.?
items.answer: I knew she would succeed in her exam.

items.prompt: I thought they arrive tomorrow.?
items.answer: I thought they would arrive the next day.

items.prompt: She explained to me that she was sick, but now she is fine.?
items.answer: She explained to me that she had been sick, but now she is fine.

items.prompt: I understood that he will leave for abroad next week.?
items.answer: I understood that he would leave for abroad next week.

items.prompt: I didn't know you graduated from university last year.?
items.answer: I didn't know you had graduated from university last year.

items.prompt: She told me she loves reading books.?
items.answer: She told me she loved reading books.

items.prompt: I thought they will come to the party last night.?
items.answer: I thought they would come to the party last night.

items.prompt: He explained to me that he works on a new project now.?
items.answer: He explained to me that he was working on a new project.

items.prompt: I didn't know you moved to a new apartment.?
items.answer: I didn't know you had moved to a new apartment.

items.prompt: She informed me that she will move to another city next month.?
items.answer: She informed me that she would move to another city next month.

items.prompt: I understood he was abroad last year.?
items.answer: I understood he had been abroad last year.

items.prompt: I thought they will get married this summer.?
items.answer: I thought they would get married this summer.

items.prompt: He told me he started a new job a month ago.?
items.answer: He told me he had started a new job a month ago.

items.prompt: I didn't know you can play the piano.?
items.answer: I didn't know you could play the piano.
